languages.text: "Я был там два раза. Один — даже охрану и слуг хозяева станции требуют оставлять в шаттле. Странное место, клянусь {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Троном{/g}. Меня то без причины бросало в дрожь, то наоборот, становилось легко и радостно. Хотя с чего бы? Обстановка там мрачная. У всех людей, что мне там прислуживали, ампутированы языки. Впрочем, вам вряд ли интересны такие детали... Когда мы закончим здесь, я могу попытаться связаться со станцией и запросить доступ и для вас — но я почти уверен, это ничего не даст".

traits.locale_text: "Я был там два раза. Один — даже охрану и слуг хозяева станции требуют оставлять в шаттле. Странное место, клянусь {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Троном{/g}. Меня то без причины бросало в дрожь, то наоборот, становилось легко и радостно. Хотя с чего бы? Обстановка там мрачная. У всех людей, что мне там прислуживали, ампутированы языки. Впрочем, вам вряд ли интересны такие детали... Когда мы закончим здесь, я могу попытаться связаться со станцией и запросить доступ и для вас — но я почти уверен, это ничего не даст".

languages.text: "I have been to the station twice. Alone — it is the masters' demand that even guards and servants be left on the shuttle. By the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}, is it a bizarre place. Inexplicably, my emotions would shift from sudden trembling to carefree jubilation. For what reason, I cannot say. That station was far from uplifting. Every servant who tended to me there had had their tongue amputated. Well, I doubt such details are of interest to you... Once we are done here, I can try to contact the station and request access for you as well — but I am almost certain it will be for naught."
languages.original_text: "Я был там два раза. Один — даже охрану и слуг хозяева станции требуют оставлять в шаттле. Странное место, клянусь {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Троном{/g}. Меня то без причины бросало в дрожь, то наоборот, становилось легко и радостно. Хотя с чего бы? Обстановка там мрачная. У всех людей, что мне там прислуживали, ампутированы языки. Впрочем, вам вряд ли интересны такие детали... Когда мы закончим здесь, я могу попытаться связаться со станцией и запросить доступ и для вас — но я почти уверен, это ничего не даст".

traits.locale_text: "I have been to the station twice. Alone — it is the masters' demand that even guards and servants be left in the shuttle. By the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} is it a strange place. Inexplicably, I was going from trembling to feeling carefree and jubilant. For what reason, I cannot say, for there was nothing uplifting about it. Every servant who tended to me there had had their tongue amputated. Well, I doubt such details are of interest to you... Once we are done here, I can try to contact the station and request access for you as well — but I am almost certain it will be for naught."

Inexplicably, I was going from trembling to feeling carefree and jubilant. For what reason, I cannot say, for there was nothing uplifting about it. Every servant who tended to me there had had their tongue amputated. Well, I doubt such details are of interest to you... Once we are done here, I can try to contact the station and request access for you as well — but I am almost certain it will be for naught."

Once we are done here, I can try to contact the station and request access for you as well — but I am almost certain it will be for naught."

languages.text: «He estado en la estación dos veces. Solo: es exigencia de los amos que incluso los guardias y sirvientes se queden en la lanzadera. Por el {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono{/g}, es un lugar extraño. Inexplicablemente, mis emociones iban de temblores repentinos a jubilosa despreocupación. No podría decir por qué. Esa estación era de todo menos alentadora. A todo criado que me atendió allí le habían amputado la lengua. Bueno, dudo que tales detalles le interesen... Una vez que hayamos terminado aquí, puedo intentar contactar con la estación y solicitar acceso para usted también, pero estoy casi seguro de que será en vano».
languages.original_text: "I have been to the station twice. Alone — it is the masters' demand that even guards and servants be left on the shuttle. By the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}, is it a bizarre place. Inexplicably, my emotions would shift from sudden trembling to carefree jubilation. For what reason, I cannot say. That station was far from uplifting. Every servant who tended to me there had had their tongue amputated. Well, I doubt such details are of interest to you... Once we are done here, I can try to contact the station and request access for you as well — but I am almost certain it will be for naught."

traits.locale_text: «He estado en la estación dos veces. Solo: es exigencia de los amos que incluso los guardias y sirvientes se queden en la lanzadera. Por el {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono{/g}, es un lugar extraño. Inexplicablemente, mis emociones iban de temblores repentinos a jubilosa despreocupación. No podría decir por qué. Esa estación era de todo menos alentadora. A todo criado que me atendió allí le habían amputado la lengua. Bueno, dudo que tales detalles le interesen... Una vez que hayamos terminado aquí, puedo intentar contactar con la estación y solicitar acceso para usted también, pero estoy casi seguro de que será en vano».

languages.text: "Ich war schon zweimal auf der Station. Allein — die Meister verlangen, dass selbst Wachen und Diener auf dem Shuttle bleiben. Beim {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Thron{/g}, was für eine bizarre Welt die Station doch ist. Meine Emotionen wechselten dort unerklärlicherweise von plötzlichem Zittern zu sorglosem Jubel und zurück. Ohne dass ich zu sagen vermag, warum. Diese Station war alles andere als erbaulich. Sämtlichen Dienern dort waren die Zungen amputiert worden. Nun, solche Details sind für Euch wohl kaum von Interesse ... Wenn wir hier fertig sind, kann ich versuchen, die Station zu kontaktieren und auch für Euch Zugang zu erbitten — auch wenn ich fast gewiss bin, dass es vergebens ist."
languages.original_text: "I have been to the station twice. Alone — it is the masters' demand that even guards and servants be left on the shuttle. By the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}, is it a bizarre place. Inexplicably, my emotions would shift from sudden trembling to carefree jubilation. For what reason, I cannot say. That station was far from uplifting. Every servant who tended to me there had had their tongue amputated. Well, I doubt such details are of interest to you... Once we are done here, I can try to contact the station and request access for you as well — but I am almost certain it will be for naught."

Beim {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Thron{/g}, was für eine bizarre Welt die Station doch ist. Meine Emotionen wechselten dort unerklärlicherweise von plötzlichem Zittern zu sorglosem Jubel und zurück. Ohne dass ich zu sagen vermag, warum. Diese Station war alles andere als erbaulich. Sämtlichen Dienern dort waren die Zungen amputiert worden. Nun, solche Details sind für Euch wohl kaum von Interesse ... Wenn wir hier fertig sind, kann ich versuchen, die Station zu kontaktieren und auch für Euch Zugang zu erbitten — auch wenn ich fast gewiss bin, dass es vergebens ist."

languages.text: « J'ai déjà visité la station par deux fois. Seul ; selon les exigences des maîtres, même les gardes et les serviteurs doivent rester à bord de la navette. Par le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône{/g}, c'est vraiment un drôle d'endroit... Mes émotions y changeaient constamment, entre tremblements soudains et jubilation totale, mais je serais bien incapable d'expliquer pourquoi. On ne peut pas dire que la station respirait la joie de vivre. Tous les serviteurs qui s'y occupaient de moi s'étaient fait couper la langue. Enfin, je ne sais pas si c'est le genre de détail qui vous intéresse... Quand nous en aurons terminé ici, je veux bien essayer de contacter la station pour demander à ce qu'on vous en ouvre l'accès, mais je suis presque certain de ne pas avoir gain de cause. »
languages.original_text: "I have been to the station twice. Alone — it is the masters' demand that even guards and servants be left on the shuttle. By the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}, is it a bizarre place. Inexplicably, my emotions would shift from sudden trembling to carefree jubilation. For what reason, I cannot say. That station was far from uplifting. Every servant who tended to me there had had their tongue amputated. Well, I doubt such details are of interest to you... Once we are done here, I can try to contact the station and request access for you as well — but I am almost certain it will be for naught."

Enfin, je ne sais pas si c'est le genre de détail qui vous intéresse... Quand nous en aurons terminé ici, je veux bien essayer de contacter la station pour demander à ce qu'on vous en ouvre l'accès, mais je suis presque certain de ne pas avoir gain de cause. »

languages.text: “我曾去过那座星站两次。我是一个人过去的，因为奥赛罗家族的族长要求我把所有侍卫与仆从都留在穿梭机上。{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}在上，那个地方真的很古怪。那个时候，我时而突然浑身发抖，时而陷入无忧无虑的欣喜之中，这些感觉实在是莫名其妙。所以我得说，那个地方恐怕不会让人感到很愉快。当时，侍奉我的每位仆人都被割掉了舌头。呃，我不确定您是否想了解这些细节……等我们这边的事情结束之后，我可以试着联络空间站，为您申请进入星站的资格。不过，我几乎可以肯定，这么做是白费功夫。”
languages.original_text: "I have been to the station twice. Alone — it is the masters' demand that even guards and servants be left on the shuttle. By the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}, is it a bizarre place. Inexplicably, my emotions would shift from sudden trembling to carefree jubilation. For what reason, I cannot say. That station was far from uplifting. Every servant who tended to me there had had their tongue amputated. Well, I doubt such details are of interest to you... Once we are done here, I can try to contact the station and request access for you as well — but I am almost certain it will be for naught."

traits.locale_text: “我曾去过那座星站两次。我是一个人过去的，因为奥赛罗家族的族长要求我把所有侍卫与仆从都留在穿梭机上。{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}在上，那个地方真的很古怪。我时而突然浑身发抖，时而陷入无忧无虑的欣喜之中，这些感觉实在是莫名其妙。所以我得说，那个地方恐怕不会让人感到很愉快。当时，侍奉我的每位仆人都被割掉了舌头。呃，我不确定您是否想了解这些细节……等我们这边的事情结束之后，我可以试着联络空间站，为您申请进入星站的资格。不过，我几乎可以肯定，这么做是白费功夫。”

languages.text: 「ステーションへは2度訪れたことがある。俺ひとりでね。マスターの要求により、護衛も使用人もシャトルに残された。{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}王座{/g}に誓って、あそこは奇妙な場所だよ。不可解な話だが、そこでは震えが突然くるかと思えば、感情が心地よい歓喜へと変わる。理由はわからないがね。ステーションは、高揚感とはほど遠い場所だったよ。そこで俺に対応してくれた使用人は全員、舌を切られていた。まあ、そんな細かい話はあなたには興味ないだろうが…ここでの件が片付いたら、ステーションに連絡して、あなたの分もアクセスをリクエストしてみよう。まぁ、無駄だとは思うがね」
languages.original_text: "I have been to the station twice. Alone — it is the masters' demand that even guards and servants be left on the shuttle. By the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}, is it a bizarre place. Inexplicably, my emotions would shift from sudden trembling to carefree jubilation. For what reason, I cannot say. That station was far from uplifting. Every servant who tended to me there had had their tongue amputated. Well, I doubt such details are of interest to you... Once we are done here, I can try to contact the station and request access for you as well — but I am almost certain it will be for naught."

traits.locale_text: 「ステーションへは2度訪れたことがある。ひとりでね…護衛も使用人もシャトルに残せというのが主の要求だ。{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}玉座{/g}のそばとは奇妙な場所だよ。うまく言えないけど、突然震えがきたと思ったら、心地よい歓喜に変わった。なぜだろう、ステーションは気持ちが上がるところとは程遠い、とは言えないな。そこで世話をしてくれた使用人は、どの人も舌を切られていたよ。まあ、そこまでの話は興味はないか…ここの事が片付いたら、ステーションに連絡して、あなたの分もアクセスをリクエストしてみよう 。まぁ、無駄だとは思うけどね」

「ステーションへは2度訪れたことがある。俺ひとりでね。マスターの要求により、護衛も使用人もシャトルに残された。{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}王座{/g}に誓って、あそこは奇妙な場所だよ。不可解な話だが、そこでは震えが突然くるかと思えば、感情が心地よい歓喜へと変わる。理由はわからないがね。ステーションは、高揚感とはほど遠い場所だったよ。そこで俺に対応してくれた使用人は全員、舌を切られていた。まあ、そんな細かい話はあなたには興味ないだろうが…ここでの件が片付いたら、ステーションに連絡して、あなたの分もアクセスをリクエストしてみよう。まぁ、無駄だとは思うがね」

languages.text: "İstasyonda iki kez bulundum. Tek başımaydım. Başları, muhafızlarla hizmetkârların bile mekikte bırakılmasını talep eder. {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Taht{/g} şahidim olsun tuhaf bir yer. Duygularım, açıklanamaz bir şekilde ani bir titremeden kaygısız bir sevince dönüşüyordu orada. Ne sebeple, bilemiyorum. İstasyonun kendisinde iç açıcı bir hava yoktu. Orada benimle ilgilenen tüm hizmetçilerin dili kesikti. Gerçi bu tür ayrıntıların ilginizi çekeceğini sanmıyorum. Buradaki işimiz bittiğinde istasyonla temasa geçip sizin için de erişim talep edebilirim ama nafile bir çaba olacağından neredeyse eminim."
languages.original_text: "I have been to the station twice. Alone — it is the masters' demand that even guards and servants be left on the shuttle. By the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g}, is it a bizarre place. Inexplicably, my emotions would shift from sudden trembling to carefree jubilation. For what reason, I cannot say. That station was far from uplifting. Every servant who tended to me there had had their tongue amputated. Well, I doubt such details are of interest to you... Once we are done here, I can try to contact the station and request access for you as well — but I am almost certain it will be for naught."

Buradaki işimiz bittiğinde istasyonla temasa geçip sizin için de erişim talep edebilirim ama nafile bir çaba olacağından neredeyse eminim."
